The Item Roasted Squab Breast, Leg Confit

I learned two things about pigeon: it’s red meat, and it’s delicious. Pair with the finest veggies and a fermented black garlic puree and you’ve got yourself a winner.

The Place Luce $$$$

888 Howard St
San Francisco, CA 94103
